Detailed Description

This class implements a generic FilterQuad for use by PyPhase objects.

void PostProcessing::PyFilterQuad::preDraw ( Moo::EffectMaterialPtr  pMat  )  [virtual]

This method is called when the material has been set, and draw is about to be called.

For PyFilterQuad, we build our mesh and ascertain which texture map is used to derive the filter tap coordinates.
